nodes.text: Elloise Moru was the wife of Ren Moru, living on Rishi during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY the Nova Blades pirates enslaved Ren for his debt of 3,000 credits and forced him to mine exonium for the next two years. During this time Elloise was trying to save enough money to pay off Ren's debt, but the interest rates kept going up; she eventually realized that the debt for merely an excuse to keep Ren and the others working for free forever. In 3637 BBY Ren was saved by an individual working to bring down the Order of Revan and Elloise send a letter of thanks to her husband's rescuer. Though the Moru couple left their old home, Ren stayed on Rishi and began working for the person who granted him freedom.
